content:
I'm creating some sample provenance records for my directory use case (to indicate where I got the resource from) and the reason property binding to a purpose of use valueset seems strange.
http://sqlonfhir-stu3.azurewebsites.net/fhir/Provenance/moderated-content
This is an example resource I'm putting together to try and represent a record that was sourced from multiple other resources and merged.
Yes, its a curated provider directory instance
@Brian Postlethwaite what other codes would you like there? If you don't want to record the PurposeOfUse, then don't. right?
